So She Drugged Him with Benadryl, Deputies Allege The boyfriend told authorities he gained access to girlfriend Mariah Turner's phone, which confirmed she was allegedly drugging him to cheat on him [Brinley Hineman](/author/brinley-hineman) A [South Carolina woman](https://themessenger.com/news/fentanyl-arrest-south-carolina-woman) is facing charges after local authorities say she drugged her boyfriend so she could have an affair, reports said. Mariah Turner is accused of giving her boyfriend, who wasn’t identified, "pink stuff,” which authorities believe was Benadryl, local television station [WPDE-TV reported.](https://wpde.com/news/local/lexington-woman-accused-of-drugging-boyfriend-to-conceal-two-month-affair-mariah-turner-johhnson-deputies-benadryl-pharmacy) The secret drugging went on for at least two months, according to the Lexington County Sheriff's Department. The boyfriend told the sheriff’s department that Turner mixed the drug with drinks, which she gave him after work on multiple occasions between Oct. 15 and Dec. 8. He also gained access to Turner’s cell phone, which confirmed that he was being drugged so Turner could cheat on him, WPDE reported. The sheriff's department alleges that Turner communicated the alleged plans with her sister. Turner is charged with malicious tampering with food, Columbia television station [WOLO-TV reported.](https://www.abccolumbia.com/2023/12/27/lexington-co-woman-accused-of-drugging-man-so-she-could-cheat/) [South Carolina Mom Gave Boy, 6, Enough Benadryl to Kill a Grown Man ‘Because He Was Hyperactive’: Deputies](/news/south-carolina-mom-gave-boy-6-enough-benadryl-to-kill-a-grown-man-because-he-was-hyperactive-deputies?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [South Carolina Deputies Bust Suspect With $95K From Alleged ATM Robbery](/news/south-carolina-deputies-bust-suspect-with-95k-from-alleged-atm-robbery?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [South Carolina Woman Gets Life Sentence After DNA Links Her to Newborn’s River Death](/news/south-carolina-woman-gets-life-sentence-after-dna-links-her-to-newborns-river-death?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Amy Vilardi, South Carolina Daughter Accused of Killing Family, Asked Court to Free Her So She Could See Her Kids](/news/amy-vilardi-south-carolina-daughter-accused-of-killing-family-asked-court-to-free-her-so-she-could-see-her-kids?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [South Carolina Truck Driver Stole 41,000 Pounds of Chicken on Georgia Route: Deputies](/news/south-carolina-truck-driver-stole-41000-pounds-of-chicken-on-georgia-route-deputies?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Bill Cosby Faces New Lawsuit as Another Woman Accuses Him of Allegedly Drugging and Raping Her](/entertainment/bill-cosby-faces-new-lawsuit-as-another-woman-accuses-him-of-allegedly-drugging-and-raping-her?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [privacy policy](/info/privacy-policy)and [terms of use](/info/terms-of-use). -
